tool_description: With Viber’s APIs, you can create unique experiences for users at scale.
name: Viber
title: Viber

api_list.name: deleteAllWebhooks
getAccountInfo
api_list.description: Fetch the account’s details as registered in Viber. The account admin will be able to edit most of these details from his Viber client.

api_list.name: getOnlineStatus
api_list.description: Fetch the online status of a given subscribed account members. The API supports up to 100 user id per request and those users must be subscribed to the account.

api_list.name: getUserDetails
api_list.description: Fetch the details of a specific Viber user based on his unique user ID. The user ID can be obtained from the callbacks sent to the account regarding user’s actions. This request can be sent twice during a 12 hours period for each user ID.

api_list.name: sendBroadcastMessage
api_list.description: Send messages to multiple Viber users who subscribe to the account. Sending a message to a user will be possible only after the user has subscribed to the Public Account by pressing the subscribe button or by sending a message, or by sending a message to a bot. The ability to send broadcast messages is only opened on application and approval from Viber account managers.

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

api_list.name: sendCarouselContentMessage
api_list.description: The Carousel Content Message type allows a user to scroll through a list of items, each composed of an image, description and call to action button.

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

api_list.name: sendContact
api_list.description: Send contact messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

api_list.name: sendFile
api_list.description: Send file messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

required_parameters.name: media
required_parameters.description: URL of the file. Max size 50 MB. See forbidden file formats for unsupported file types

required_parameters.name: fileName
required_parameters.description: Name of the file. File name should include extension. Max 256 characters (including file extension). Sending a file without extension or with the wrong extension might cause the client to be unable to open the file

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: Size of the file in bytes

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

api_list.name: sendLocation
api_list.description: Send location messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

api_list.name: sendPicture
api_list.description: Send picture messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

required_parameters.name: media
required_parameters.description: URL of the image (JPEG).  Max size 1 MB. Only JPEG format is supported. Other image formats as well as animated GIFs can be sent as URL messages or file messages

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail
optional_parameters.description: URL of a reduced size image (JPEG). Max size 100 kb. Recommended: 400x400. Only JPEG format is supported

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

api_list.name: sendSticker
api_list.description: Send sticker messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

required_parameters.name: stickerId
required_parameters.description: Unique Viber sticker ID. For examples visit the https://developers.viber.com/docs/tools/sticker-ids page

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

api_list.name: sendTextMessage
api_list.description: Send text messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

api_list.name: sendUrl
api_list.description: Send url messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

api_list.name: sendVideo
api_list.description: Send video messages to Viber users who subscribe to the account.

required_parameters.name: size
required_parameters.description: Size of the video in bytes

required_parameters.name: media
required_parameters.description: URL of the video (MP4, H264). Max size 50 MB. Only MP4 and H264 are supported

optional_parameters.name: duration
optional_parameters.description: Video duration in seconds; will be displayed to the receiver. Max 180 seconds

optional_parameters.name: trackingData
optional_parameters.description: Allow the account to track messages and user’s replies. Sent tracking_data value will be passed back with user’s reply

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail
optional_parameters.description: URL of a reduced size image (JPEG). Max size 100 kb. Recommended: 400x400. Only JPEG format is supported

optional_parameters.name: senderAvatar
optional_parameters.description: The sender’s avatar URL

optional_parameters.name: minApiVersion
optional_parameters.description: Minimal API version required by clients for this message

api_list.name: setWebhook
api_list.description: Webhook will be used for receiving callbacks and user messages from Viber.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Account webhook URL to receive callbacks & messages from users. Webhook URL must use SSL.

optional_parameters.name: eventTypes
optional_parameters.description: Indicates the types of Viber events that the account owner would like to be notified about. Don’t include this parameter in your request to get all events

api_list.name: webhookEvent
api_list.description: This webhook will be used for receiving callbacks and user messages from Viber.

optional_parameters.name: token
optional_parameters.description: Your viber token
